sub_title: Manager- Data & Analytics at EY | CFA Level 1 Candidate
summary:
Experienced Manager working in the Data & Analytics domain within EY’s Technology Consulting Service Line in the Netherlands.  The focus of my work is to advise and empower our clients in their Digital Transformation journey by building advanced analytics applications leveraging on existing technologies.

My educational background is in Geo-Informatics with a major in Applied Statistics and Databases. In my previous engagements that spans over 7 years, I have gathered experience in managing and advising clients (Public Sector; Defense, Space & Intelligence; Maritime & Logistics; Banking & Insurance) in all major stages of a typical consulting project life cycle (pre-sales, solution design, implementation & delivery, roadmap). My specializations are in MLOps, Cognitive Computing, Data Governance & Infrastructure, Machine Learning and AI.

I consider myself cross functional in my role and proactive in my attitude and try to adapt well in an progressive agile work environment.

I have a knack for Hackathons and Code Jams. Outside of work, I love to cook and travel and have a habit of breaking & (almost) fixing things.

projects.title: SenseAIR- (Global Top 25 and Regional Winner- Netherlands "Peoples'​ Choice"​) NASA Space Apps 2015
projects.description:
We4people are passionate about creating awareness in relation to air quality and health!
As a team, we came up with the solution SenseAIR, which transform existing data into easily understandable information for everyone for relating exposure to pollution and possible effects on health!
The application uses air quality information derived from NASA repository, that is linked with the users locations and movements in their daily life. In detail, the application integrates earth observation and in situ air quality data derived from NASA; links with user location and  predicts associated health concerns.) When a level of exposure is reached, the application informs the user about possible health risks.
Our idea adds value to bring closer of what has been developed so far. It empowers people to make decisions, which strengthens the basic human right to have a healthy life. Decisions as an individual, or a community member;which actively leads for better cities, better future!

projects.title: Space-Time observations for city level air quality modelling and mapping
projects.description:
Supervisors: Dr. Nicholas Hamm and Prof. Alfred Stein, ITC-EOS, University of Twente
The project aimed at developing (near) real-time air quality maps for pollutants PM10 and PM2.5 concentration in Eindhoven. It utilized high-frequent low cost sensor network data (AiREAS-ILM Network) and combined with simulated predictions from Urban Dispersion Model (URBIS developed by TNO) in a Bayesian Maximum Entropy (BME) framework using measurement uncertainty as a key indicator. The results can be used for disseminating information to local public and municipality via smartphone apps and/or web portals.

projects.title: eCare - Android App presentation at ESA App Camp 2015 - Noordwijk, Netherlands
projects.description:
Regional level (Netherlands) app challenge at ESA App Camp 2015 hosted at ESA BIC Noodwijk, Netherlands and sponsored by SAP, NL Space.

"eCARE" utilizes Senteniel 1 Data and APIs from Uzuiji Labs in a SAP HANA Cloud Platform framework to enable users to know the environmental efficiency of a product (food, furniture, car etc.) by scanning the barcode and registering in a Geo-portal. It recommends more environmental friendly product to the users and this crowdsourced information also reaches the manufacturers for improvising their product and market.

projects.title: Context Driven Region Based Data Management for Change Detection- Case study of South Chennai.
projects.description:
Guide - Dr. C Udhayakumar, Associate Prof, Institute of Remote Sensing, Anna University Chennai
This project involved object based classification of high resolution urban imagery (Quickbird) and applying contextual information (GLCM) for post classification change detection. This was informative for local municipality for developing urban planning strategies and site suitability analysis for increasing green cover in Chennai.

Data utilized - QuickBIRD and Liss-IV
Temporal Resolution- 2008 March and 2013 March
Methods Incorporated - Ostu's Method, Wavelet based Segmentation, Watershed Algorithm, SVM, Post Classification
Platform- MATLAB

projects.title: Change Detection in Dubai 1987-2010
projects.description:
Project Guide - Prof. Yifang Ban, Dept. of Geoinformatics, KTH
Studying the Change detection in Dubai Shoreline features from1987-2010 using Landsat Data using Image Rationing, Image Differencing and Change Vector Analysis and stating the relative accuracies.

projects.title: Suitability Analysis for KFC Restaurant in Stockholm Central
projects.description:
Project Guide- Dr. Takeshi Shirabe, Asst Prof, Department of Geoinformatics, KTH Sweden
Suitability Analysis by Multi Criteria Evaluation for deciding the best locations for opening KFC restaurants in Stockholm. Importing of Data using KML Code and JOSM (Open Street Maps) using Google Place API and using ArcGIS for the evaluation.

projects.title: Average- Android GPS application
projects.description:
Project Guide- Dr. Győző Gidófalvi, Assistant Professor, Department of Geoinformatics, KTH
An Android app basically determining the proximity analysis of locations using smart phone sensors. WPS and WMS features were enabled for drawing polygons on the screen of smart phone and it produces an alert if the GPS location is outside the polygon.

projects.title: Study of Potential Fishing Zones ( Arabian Sea) using Remote Sensing and GIS
projects.description:
Project Guide- Prof. Dr. Parth Sarathi Roy, Ex- Director
Assistant Guide- Dr. A.K. Mishra, Scientist, Marine and Atmospheric Sciences Division
This project integrated Earth Observation data to determine the phytoplankton movements in Arabian Sea and generated maps of potential fishing zones. Integration of this information in a GIS and dissemination to local fishermen via broadcast media and SMS could result in increased catch.

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for Product Team: Artificial Intelligence Applications (AIA) within Emerging Technologies Practice of CGI Nederland.

Playing an active role in leveraging technology, expertise and people in the field of Data Analytics towards building client-centric solutions.
profile_positions.title: Product Owner- Artificial Intelligence

profile_positions.description:
Responsible and accountable for :
- Delivering client engagements ensuring high-level client satisfaction and on-time/on-budget delivery in Public Sector domain.
- Developing and supporting client-relationships and promoting CGI expertise with local clients and in the market.
- Thought leadership and sharing of expertise in Data Analytics (Advanced Analytics) and Information Driven Operations.
profile_positions.title: Principal Information Technology Consultant

profile_positions.description: Representing NL for Intelligent Automation and Artificial Intelligence practice at CGI's Strategic Business Unit level of Central Eastern Europe.
profile_positions.title: NL Lead- Artificial Intelligence: Intelligent Automation Practice

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for leading Sub-Practice: Advanced Predictive Analytics (APA) within CGI Nederland's DICE (Digital Insights Community of Experts).

Focus areas:
1) Share, propagate and leverage the expertise of Data Analytics in and across CGI Nederland.
2) Playing an active role in leveraging technology, expertise in the field of Data Analytics towards building client-centric solutions.
3) Training and Mentoring fellow Data Scientists and enthusiasts
profile_positions.title: Sub-Practice Lead Advance Predictive Analytics

profile_positions.description:
For a Public Sector client, I am involved in an ongoing project as Experienced Data Scientist and Solution Architect.
My work primarily revolves around design, develop and implement a Complex Event Processor (CEP) to detect new events and incidents from voluminous Social Media Texts and attributes by employing Natural Language Processing and Machine Learning principles. This is integrated in an end-to-end solution for the client.
profile_positions.title: Technical Manager

profile_positions.description: For a client in Public Sector domain, I am working as a Technical Lead and Solution Architect towards designing, developing and deploying a secured and efficient ad-hoc information exchange between different stakeholders.
profile_positions.title: Technical Manager

profile_positions.description:
Due to my acumen in proposal writing and affinity with domain focused research (Space, Geo-ICT, Data Analytics) I am involved in various bid or proposals as Subject Matter Expert within CGI.
These bids are catered at B2B levels at both Dutch Market (such as RVO, NSO) and European Markets (ESA ARTES IAP, Horizon 2020)
profile_positions.title: Senior Subject Matter Expert

profile_positions.description:
1. For a client (globally renowned engineering consultancy) involved in Port Logistics, Shipping and Maritime Industry, I am part of the team that develops and provides a platform-as-a-service for port-hinterland analysis. I was involved as Geo-Data Scientist and Database Specialist to help design, develop and implement database(s) to accommodate Geographic and Non-Geographic data sets.

2. For a client (globally renowned engineering consultancy) involved in Port Logistics, Shipping and Maritime Industry, I led the technical design and implementation of Cloud based Automation Pipelines for assisting Dynamic Mooring Analysis.
profile_positions.title: Technical Manager

profile_positions.description:
1. Migration Radar 2.0 was an ESA feasibility flagship project to deal with emergency management services for Migration streams of people to Europe by combining and generating insights from Big data sources such as Space Assets and Social Media data mining. Ipsit was involved as Senior Data Scientist and Solution architect.

2. For a client active in Railway and Infrastructure domain, I am involved in an innovative project that employs various Remote Sensing technologies (Drone, LiDAR, Satellite Radar) for Asset Management. During bid phase, I contributed as Subject Matter Expert and during the project, I am responsible in developing a framework to investigate and automate the process of Georeferencing by using Satellite Radar Images instead of conventional data collection on field. This would enable reduction of need for man power and rapid processing suitable for inaccessible terrains.
profile_positions.title: Senior Data Scientist

profile_positions.description:
Contributed as a Data Scientist in building various services for CGI’s Space Validation Lab (SVL). SVL is an infrastructure that enables the integration and validation of diverse space assets to generate insights and value to enhance and optimize operations of Dutch commercial (AgroTech, Shipping, Logistics) and institutional clients (Roadworks, Maritime and Offshore).

As one of the spin-offs, Ipsit worked for a feasibility study under Dutch SBIR (Short Business Innovative Research) funding together with University of Groningen and Imagem to combine and validate Satellite Data and in-situ measurements to determine primary production parameters in the Eems-Dollard Estuary in the north of the Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Data Scientist

profile_positions.description:
The project aimed at making Satellite Data Products & Services accessible to the different industrial and public sector user communities and to help the insurance sector better understand the level of risk.

Ipsit was part of the team responsible for the design and implementation of the web-based platform for the intial PoC/Demonstrator.
profile_positions.title: Data Scientist

profile_positions.description:
The project’s goal was to create a web-based platform for provisioning Satellite Data Products and Services to support forest ecosystem monitoring and sustainable forest management.

Ipsit was primarily involved in the Frontend development team for a part of the technical implementation of the platform.
profile_positions.title: Data Scientist
